entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • .NET 7 gitignore template miss .idea (JetBrains Rider) exclusion #29224
  • Cannot run `dotnet watch` on Linux #29223
  • [NETE2ESDK]With .NET 7.0.101 SDK installed, Warning "Workload garbage collection failed with error: An item with the same key has already been added. Key: (Microsoft.NETCore.App.Runtime.Mono.android-arm, 6.0.12) displayed when installing andriod workload in CLI. #29212

Closed

  • dotnet test with msbuild parameter broken in .NET 7 #29227

PullRequests

Created

  • simplified conditions in C# class library template #29221
    Area-Infrastructure, Area-dotnet new

Merged

  • Adjust test due to different behaviors for disabled parameter between main and release/7.0.2xx #29209
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2052726 #28957
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Template verifier adoption in CommonTemplateTests #28707
    Area-dotnet new, Area-Common templates
  • Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'main' #29158
  • [8.0 -> 7.0.2 Backport] Make Apps RID Specific By Default & RID Now FDD By Default in 8.0+ #28376
    Review for breaking changes
  • Add RidSpecific, Make Apps RID Specific By Default & RID Now FDD By Default in 8.0+ #28412
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Make `dotnet publish` use `Release` by default in 8.0+ Projects #29155
    Area-Infrastructure
